text:
[Verse]
Midnight under the stars
Soft whispers in the dark
Heartbeats close by
Lost in your spark

[Verse 2]
Moonlight paints our sky
Dreams start to fly
Time takes a pause
You and I

[Chorus]
Under the stars we stand
Hand in hand in a magical land
Lost in our own command
Watch the night expand

[Verse 3]
Quiet fills the air
No worries no care
Moments that we share
Without a single tear

[Bridge]
Wishing on a light
Dreaming of the night
Holding you tight
Everything feels right

[Chorus]
Under the stars we stand
Hand in hand in a magical land
Lost in our own command
Watch the night expand
title: Under the Stars
